l.locMethodExplanation: W3C Geolocation is the preffered method as it provides greater accuracy. IP Geolocation in some cases is accurate to country levels only.
l.aboutText1: Namaz.me is a free service provided by Green Software.
l.aboutText2: A number of scripts are used from various sources in Namaz.me these are:
l.aboutText3: Namaz.me tries to use the w3c geolocation api whenever possible, But will fallback to IP geolocation if w3c geolocation api is not supported by your web browser.
l.aboutText4: Please report bugs or suggestions to ahmad.mushtaq@gmail.com.
